titles.title: Renewable Fuel Parity Act of 2011

A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to improve the renewable fuel program by combining the categories of "cellulosic biofuel" and "advance biofuel" into 1 technology- and feedstock-neutral category of "advanced biofuel", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/15/2011--Introduced. Renewable Fuel Parity Act of 2011 - Amends the Clean Air Act to revise the renewable fuel program to include: (1) "cellulosic biofuel" within the definition of "advanced biofuel," and (2) fuel derived from algae among the types of fuels eligible for consideration as advanced biofuel.
